Erasmus+ : Strategic IP Management for Effective R&I in Asian Higher Education (SPIRE)
======================================================================================

by [website](https://fke.utm.my/author/website/ "Posts by website")
 | Jan 18, 2017 | [ECE](https://fke.utm.my/category/ece/)

![erasmus-logo](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/Erasmus-logo.png)

Congratulations UTM team for securing €831,506 worth of grant from [Erasmus+](https://www.facebook.com/EUErasmusPlusProgramme/)
 for project entitled Strategic IP Management for Effective R&I in Asian Higher Education (SPIRE) led by Dr. Fauzan Khairi Che Harun

Erasmus+ Capacity Building is a grant offered by [European Commission](https://www.facebook.com/EuropeanCommission/)
 to promote mobility among institution around the world. In the cycle, there are 736 applications, 653 being considered and only 147 selected with 18 in reserve list. UTM is among only 3 Asian universities being selected as coordinator for this Erasmus+ cycle.

Well done to the UTM team!!!
